item_category: Lenov Tab M10 Plus is one impressive media tablet from the 2nd Gen tab family. The standout metal design gives a premium look and feel with modern simplicity. A 10.3inch FHD screen and dual speakers offer immersive entertainment. And make it portable enough for your daily life by adding the protective folio case.
review_title: Upgrade on my six year old Lenovo
OK but problems that Lenovo could easily avoid.
Very easy set up & easy to navigate
Great tablet exactly what I was looking for
Tablet looks fab and has a nice FHD screen
Does everything you need and good value
It's really nice and easy to use.
Excellent tablet does what I want
Great spec, easy to use and set up
Straight forward order and collection at Argos
I like the tablet and its same what I expect
Really good looking tablet and easy to use.
I like my tablet very much
The tablet is fantastic useful and designed.
Nice an light fantastic picture an easy to use
Works great for what I bought it for
Not as good as a Samsung equivalent
Brill update from earlier Lenovo Tab
My tablet has a lot of storage space
Good Memory at a Good Price
Utterly Brilliant, best buy for ages!
easy to install and set up
Everything you want in a Tablet
Amazing tablet, great for long journeys and time a
This tablet is light weight and easy to navigate
Quick and Fantastic Tablet with built in Assistant
review_text: I bought this tablet as a back up for my current tablet which is slowing down now. I'm really pleased with it and it was very easy to set up when I synced it with my Huawei phone. I just deleted the Huawei apps when finished setting it up. It is very fast and I would have given it 5 stars if the battery lasted a bit longer, but that may be me getting carried away and not realising how long I spend using it sometimes!

Great tablets
Great value for money, would definitely 
Recommend!
I bought this for my grandson who uses it for educational purposes which he finds excellent

Battery life awful and charging slow.
Screen good and clear.
Not too bad but am upset at discovering i cant buy the alexa dock anywhere.had i have known i would have gone for the one that came with a dock.
Had the device for a few weeks now and is working well, set up was easy with migration from my previous very slow device nice and quick. Have loaded Microsoft Launcher a bit of a mistake

Excellent laptop! I'd like it to last a bit longer between charges, but can't mark it down because battery life is as advertised, and regular recharging is the price you pay for the high quality screen.
Good tables for the kids. Works well for the whole family.
Fab item dose everything you need great for online shopping and fun games

Bought this to replace a six year old Lenovo that had become too slow to be useful.
This replacement is just what I needed, quick and responsive and great value for money with having 128 gig of memory.
Could just easily add my SD card from my old tablet with all my music on and away we go.
I brought this for my sis for her bday and couldn’t be more happy with it

Tablet OK but uses a different charging lead to other Lenovo products that I have, so not good as I will always have to carry the lead with me, whereas up to now I just had leads in my homes etc. The user manual was also very difficult to get from Lenovo.
Is very good and easy to use perfect

Very easy to navigate through setting up of tablet, love how light it is, plus delighted to be using a Lenovo again after 14months of an Acer laptop that my charger snapped inside charging port, with no way of getting my laptop back up & running. So I went back to my favourite tablet maker Lenovo & as always they never disappoint me or my expectations.
Well worth the money
Very pleased with the tablet, easy to use, looks good, quality is good, pictures taken with it are a good quality
Great size, great look storage perfect for me and video and sound quality amazing
it's good.  i like it. 128gb its good space for my file.
It was very easy to make the order friendly team and quickly got it. Thank you
very slim and lightweight,just what I wanted.I still cant work it,but thats me not the lenovo!
This tablet is  very quick compared to an older model. Would definitely recommend it.
Decent value compared to many of it's competitors, imo. It's quick, good screen quality, charges quickly and holds it's battery life well. I like it!
It's a lovely tablet and my daughter really enjoy it.
Excellent product and service
It’s perfect - the best I ever had. Highly  recommended for all purposes.
Perfect storage capacity easy to use but battery life is not that good
I love this tablet, it has great storage and a very good spec for the price range, easy to order, good stock and simple pickup even in lockdown, high quality product for a very reasonable price!

Tablets worth for this price.
Long battery life
Quick processor don't hesitate.

My Lenovo tablet is amazing and would highly recommend, its as good as a Samsung if not better. However contacting Argos by phone to talk to someone is a nightmare don't even try unless absolutely necessary
My Child like IT  food battery

Bought this to replace my Samsung tab and I am not disappointed.  Wanted something to show people high resolution pictures from my cameras and this is far better than expected. 
Clear bright and very responsive screen. 
Perfect all round tablet
Very good product, and would highly recommend

Everything was fine but every now and then it would get frozen and I don’t know why. Also, it was once stuck in an update saying ‘Android Starting’ and it still didn’t turn on- I managed to fix it by downloading nova settings!
Like the fact this has 128gb of internal memory where most others are 32gb max.
A great Tablet nicely packaged and fast. The Screen is awesome for watching BBC-IPlayer and You Tube Videos, I highly recommend.
I am Very Impressed with the quality for the price

Great tablet, have always used iPads but I thought I would give android a go and I'm pleasantly surprised, the battery lasts a long time the screen is ideal for what I use it for, only annoying thing it doesn't have finger print recognition it has face which I find a bit annoying.

Really like this tablet. Very user friendly. The only disappointment was trying to get access to the set up instructions. Practically impossible. Bad website by Lenova but you dont really need it. Easy to set up. Apart from Lenovo poor website i would recommend.
Well, compared to an ipad its nothing but if you think about the cost, its a good one.
Its a superb tablet that has exceeded my expectations. Very high standard and finish. Would reccomend to everyone.
Exactly what I needed, quick processor, big storage, and great for watching films. Couldn't buy better, for the price, and better than the Samsung tablets, which cost a lot more

I'm absolutely delighted with the Levono M10 Plus 10.3 128GB FHD Tablet . I'm very pleased with the nice quality sound and colour of my Tablet I have had no problems at all .LEVONO is a very good make If your looking to buy a new tablet I highly recommend this one The Tablet Charges up very quickly which I really like
Enjoying my tablet so far. Easy to set up
Good product, easy to order and quick to collect at Argos.
Look no further, had a Lenovo tab, 7" loved it, then, well time for a change, had a good  Look around but still the devil you know,  10,3 What a difference, why did I wait so long,GET ONE,
Really good tablet, first lenovo purchase, very impressed.
The processor is fast & screen is very sharp
every good item price ok
Excellent product. Very clear screen. Replacement for an older product. Impressed
I am very happy with the product I purchased. Its exactly same what I expect. Excellent customer service and flexible payment plan. Very happy with shopping experience with Argos.

Was looking to update the iPad tablet I had but wanted a bigger memory of at least 128. This came up on a special offer and when I looked at the price of an iPad with the same memory I decided to give this one a go. I'm glad I did! It does everything I need  and looks/feels good. The memory can be extended to 256 with a sim.Would recommend this  it's really good value. Easy set up online guide too. Perfect.

Tablet will automatically upgrade to latest android os
Good battery life quick charging is system does not lockup or crash
This tablet is a excellent buy
Lovely tablet. Good to look at and great to use. Opening apps happens really quickly unlike my old one. So that was good to see, Received to all.
Excellent value, good build quality.

An extremely impressive piece of kit, especially useful for art purposes as the highly responsive touch screen will allow items like torch batteries to serve as a stylus to good effect. It also responds brilliantly to cheap to rubber-ended styluses as well. Splendid price, into the bargain.
Bought to replace my old galaxy tab A(2016) couldn't be happier. Quick and snappy and does exactly what I need it to do

Like the lightness of this one, compared to my previous, 3yr old,  Lenovo tab.
Very touch sensative, clear, sharp screen.
I play games and watch a lot of tv on it. 
The battery, so far, lasts ages.
Also like the improved charger point. Seems much stonger  than earlier models.
I can't think of any negative about this ⅕
Excellent Tablet, easy to set up, good battery life.
Bought this for my husband to replace his old tablet.  He is really pleased with it, great purchase and well worth the money.
My tablet works really well and battery life is brilliant.

Loving my new tablet! Great size screen. Not had one before but learning fast. The picture clarity is good. Nice and easy to find my way around. Just learning what apps I need to download. Did my first online video chat with family last week.... Awesome!
My tablet it’s just what I expected.

Its a really nice tablet, quality for games and video is great and it runs smoothly really impressed with the sound quality. A few issues have been quickly solved with an update. I would definitely recommend.

Its a beautiful tablet, easy to use, charges quick, transfers files quickly too. The two speaker make for great sound while enjoying a show or film and the screen is beautiful to look at. Interface is smooth and easy to navigate.
I went for the bigger memory and totally worth the price
Great value, for great product; more than happy with purchase and quick delivered.

Lenovo M10 Plus 10.3in 128GB FHD Tablet works well bought it for my Wife she loves it, it is the first thing that she goes to in the morning checking the weather and what’s happening on the web. This model has no problems with speed good value for the money.

Great value Tablet. Does everything you want. 
So much quicker than our last one
absolutely satisfied
Good fast start up with good memory and good screen, also bought a keyboard and case, it's like a mini laptop.

Upgraded from my older Samsung galaxy A6 tablet.
Faster processor and more storage is a big plus, the only slight downside is no torch/flashlight on the M10 plus but overall a very good tablet (would have been 5 Stars if flashlight/torch was a feature)
very good product for a very good price. my son is very happy !!!

Lenova tablet is quick and efficient . At the moment! Problem with all pcs are the updates that sloe them down over short time ... I disable them if possible .
This is good at moment
Lenovo tech is always reliable and usually good value for money .This tablet maintains that standard and is easy to use with good battery life and excellent screen quality
Great overall gadget for anything
The whole Argos experience was great an the tablet is fantastic at a very good price
fabulous little gadget, really speedy and easy to use. couldn't be happier with it!

Great remarkable Lenovo tablet.
Second tablet of same spec I have both.
First for little girl and now for my grandson son.
They’re both having a thrilling time with studying, gaming and surfing the net.
I intend to buy more as gifts.
Works really well easy to use and value for money
Nice and portable excellent tablet,fast,plenty of storage.the  only thing that lets the tablet down is the sound quality when playing video's.
Definitely purchase this tablet.
These are presents for the kids

This tablet was to replace another one I had with a lot less memory. I was so pleased that this one was on offer, with loads more memory. I did find that it was so light and thin that it kept slipping through my fingers but with a case on it is perfect. It turns on quickly and downloads really quick to. Does everything I want it to.
128GB Tablet purchased to replace older laptop. So far so good.

An absolutely great pad and i am the woelds worst complainer. If you are stingy like me and refuse to pay 100s for a pad then this is for you. It is actually surprisingly fast and there is loads of storage at 128gb.

And unlike some other well known brands, its got a 3.5mm ear phone socket. It also has the newer android charging/data connector but i suppose i will have to ipgrade from micro usb one day..
My wife uses this to watch catch-up tv and do social media and it works great.

Needed a new tablet to replace my dying Samsung. I have no complaints with my purchase. My Lenovo has a very large memory, good front and back cameras and is very easy to use. Came with a very good price. No regrets about this purchase.

Excellent tablet for the price.
Bought 2. Both kids love it. Plenty of memory. Nice screen too. Does all we need.

I wrote a comprehensive review, but then noticed I was 300 characters over the maximum. It's ok, doesn't come with a charging dock, and screen is a bit letterbox shaped. Competent in all but battery life. Soon updated to Android 10. Metal case, glass screen, no screen lag when scrolling. Quality feel.
Bought this to update an existing tablet. Not had it long but is doing what it was bought for.
this is the best tablet i have ever had .so fast and responsive very happy with my purchase
Sadly had to return this item for a refund. Ended up replacing with a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 32gb Lite. Found it faster and more responsive I’m afraid. And both were a very similar cost
Great tablet and a great price. My daughter is super happy with it
Great affordable tablet packed full of goodies best priced on the market for the amount of storage.
Very good and fast tablet

I thought this tablet was just a cheap one but I’ve had it for 2 weeks now and I can only appreciate that it’s battery is way better than my iphone & laptop combined. It runs on the latest android version software. Plus I loved the fact that almost all the features are decent with the exception of the camera but that’s understandable considering it’s not an expensive tablet. Yes I fully recommend this product. It’s fast, elegant, has an amazing battery life & fast charging. Love it all.

It is light weight and the battery life is good. I can watch quite a few videos without having the need to charge it. 
The only thing is logging in. I had to do it twice before I can get in. ONCE would be better.
I am happy with my purchase
Good.... I liked it.
Happy with my purchase

No complaints!
Easy to setup, quick start, perfect storage size (and expandable) which is perfect. Runs all apps smoothly. Video and sound are great. Easy to link controller to for gaming.

Not impressed at first due to poor battery life, from initial start-up & updates, the battery drained very quickly, went from 100% to 50% overnight when not being used, reading similar review, I did full reset and now it lasts upto 3 days obv depending on useage, no drain when not being used anymore, apart from that it's a great improvement on an earlier model, so much quicker with 4gb ram & plenty of storage with 128gb.
Definitely recommend
Bought the 128GB and very pleased. Easy to navigate, plenty of storage. Would recommend.
The tablet is very very fast and reliable, also a very nice design. Would recommend!
Works well it's fast and charges fast aswell would recommend it
It is an amazing product, really fast with a lot of storage space
Good fast tablet, easy to hold and not to heavy
After looking at plenty of tables I decided on this one. 4gb ram and 128gb storage is plenty for me. It's nice and fast, easy to use. Love everything about it. Would recommend.

Beautiful, sharp screen. Fast, not many ballast apps. Incredible value for money for the 4/128 Gb tablet. Not the latest Android version but close. Definitely at highest end of the version scale. Highly recommended.
Very pleased, at 128gb, this is plenty of memory, at a very competitive price. Just what I was looking for.

This is a great affordable tablet with 128GB storage and a sd card holder which will increase available storage. The 128GB allows for plenty of apps to be loaded and run. Youtube and other resource hungry apps appear to run very well. Also easy to set up and will link easliy to a wifi - it does NOT have the facility to run a sim card.
Really happy with this tablet. Does exactly what I want. Good sized screen, great sound and good features.
Very light and portable. Battery lasts 2 days, depending on usage. Massive storage space. Easy to use very quick to set up if you already have an android account.

Utterly Brilliant, have been waiting a long time for this to appear! I have searched for something to use to read my mags and books but be able to do other things and have a big hard drive AND be Android like our phones.Finally, a manufacturer has seen sense and built one. Comes on in seconds, picture and coulrs are amazing and battery life is long. And its £300 cheaper than the Apple equivalent which I didnt want to but as I prefer Android to replicate all the apps I have on my phone. Problem solved. Its also got a micro SD to dump stuff to.
Brilliant tablet does all my needs has 4gb ram and the storage is brilliant for my video editing

This is a fantastic tablet, lots of room for all my apps, fantastic graphics, feels sturdy and it's very fast. For the price I paid, I wasn't expecting a tablet that could easily rival a Samsung or iPad but this really does. I'm very happy with it.
Bought this to replace a previous model, the extra memory has made world of difference, worth every penny.
Must be best tablet I have ever bought for the price, plenty of storage, great Full HD screen, loud for listening to music, but best bit is not full of useless apps which I would never use.

After a lot of research decided on this for my daughter's birthday. She mainly wanted a piece of kit in size between her iPhone and laptop, portable enough for school and between friends for homework etc. This ticks all the right boxes and its memory for this price is a winner. Excellent purchase.
It works. Decent screen. Quick.  What more can be said.
The M10 FHD Plus is a great tablet it does everything I want from a tablet. Best one yet

Build quality is excellent ,the metal case has a sturdy feel ,Now the use ,does all I want but could be better ,I have an older Lenovo that cost less and the display on older one far better ,Touch screen is responsive, connection to WiFi is good ,The sound is reasonable ,The general performance is good but not to the standard of the price , Battery is too small for the devices needs ,For a budget tablet ,not so bad but I would if not installed so much ,be looking at returning ,

Overall very good, decent battery life, easy to navigate, lightweight but sturdy. Slim design which fits most cases that are available. Good graphics and sound quality. Camera easy to use with clear and precise images.

Bought this for my mum who's in her mid-70s. She only got a smartphone a couple of years ago, so a tablet was the next progression. Having bought myself a Lenovo laptop recently, and being very pleased with it, I thought I'd try the Lenovo tablet. Easy to set up if you know what you're doing (obviously no useful instructions come with any tech these days!). It's great, and mum loves it :)
Excellent device for the price, just what i wanted
Good quality. Affordable.
I bought these for my daughters. They love their new tablets. Better than the ones they had before. Great purchase.
Worth for the price good for gaming

This Lenovo M10 is sleek and stylish. It holds comfortably and is light weight. The screen is large and resolution is great. Images are clear with enough settings to change to suit. Face recognition lock is a nice feature although it can be difficult in poor lighting to unlock. With 4GB of RAM this tablet is fast with no lag. The sound quality is good I have watched movies using built in speakers and headphones with no complaints. Overall a good tablet only downside is no desktop mode.

Looking for storage, graphics, and good processing power?

Well this is your machine.... 
The 10.3" full HD screen is fantastic, never mind the front and back camera too! 

It's got an octa core chip that can handle games and work stuff too!

It's durable and sturdy which, let's face it is great if the kids drop it... It lasts and battery lasts for ever!!!

I was very pleased with this tablet indeed. I have mainly been using it for gaming and it's proved to be pretty fast. I like that it has added security steps such as facial recognition and it's very easy to use. The fact that my mum could use it definitely speaks to that! It's bigger than my last tablet but actually I quite liked the extra screen size as it meant that I could comfortably watch things on it without straining my eyes. Good sound and it's suitably loud for watching a film.

The Lenovo M10 Plus tablet is a great tablet in my opinion. It runs on Android so if you have an android smart phone you can link it to your phone account. It’s lovely and slim, easy to hold and use. The screen is crystal clear and very responsive to touch, it rotates super quickly as well. The sound is ok, people who know more maybe able to adjust it to their liking? It attached really quickly to my Bluetooth headset. The battery life is very good depending on what you’re doing.

A great tablet the sound is amazing  fantastic for music  the HD makes watching films amazing  as well as all other features that comes with this tablet I highly recommend the kids zone it gives you the peace of mind to know your children can also use this tablet safety as it’s built into the tablet a great all round tablet that does everything  and a lot more from a tablet

The battery life on this is fantastic one charge and it lasts for 2 days with solid on and off use. 
There is a already downloaded app called kids mode which is great. It’s set up with a passcode so you know they can’t get onto anything else and can play games within the app. It also has a timer which will turn the tablet into a freeze mode for a period of time that you can alter in settings. 
The feel of the tablet is smooth and slim and the screen quality is fantastic camera is okay quality.

One of the best things about this tablet is it holds it charge for ages! Another feature that I really like about this tablet is the screen, it is a really good size especially for playing games such as the sims or watching Netflix. The screen is also really clear. A useful feature is kids mode, allows you to give the tablet to children plus a password option means they can't go onto other apps In kids mode is has features such as colouring in. The tablet is also lightweight and easy to hold.

Watched programs(Netflix IPlayer ) (played games lots of Games) Used it as a book to read and have really enjoyed this Tablet. I found it really easy 2 hold for couple of hours. Battery life is brilliant lasting all day .Super fast at finding anything on the internet ..took lots of photos they have come out well video calling my Grandchildren in Lockdown have really enjoyed using it. Liked it that much I have gone and ordered 1 for my 74 year old mother as think she would find it easy 2 use
Good size, lovely screen and the camera is fantastic. I would definitely recommend.

This had a good quality feel and look to it, large clear screen with lovely graphics. Good sound quality. The rear 8mp camera is very good and comes with a large memory. The set-up was quick and easy took about 5 minutes. Screen is a bit sensitive at first but you get used to that.

Really love this tablet, been using it for a couple of weeks now & it's pretty awesome, with light usage over a week I charged it just once which was kind of mind-blowing & with heavy use like playing video games on streaming services like xCloud which is very resource heavy it handled beautifully and lasted for my entire gaming session.

Really impressed!

This is a good mid range tablet. The picture quality and brightness is brilliant, much better than my samsung but is let down by the speed. It can take a while to catch up and buff when using netflix but once it has then it is fab.
The tablet charges up and and lasts a good few days if not using excessively.
The apps open quickly and work well.
It has a large memory and the ability to add more with sd card.
On the whole the tablet is good for basic everyday use. I would recommend this.

Solid build without flex. Tactile metal case, smooth but not slippy. Responsive touchscreen, fast processing.

Whether I'm reading the news on the bigger screen or curling up with Netflix, this tablet is already my go to device. My only bugbear is that the screen collects fingerprints, but a lens cloth nearby handles that. Couldn't recommend more.

This tablet has a lovely big screen and a great camera. It doesn’t come with instructions or a manual but they are available online if needed. You also need a google account to access google play and apps for the tablet as this is android device but it allows you to create one during the set up process which I thought was good!

Sturdy design, amazing colours and clear screen with loads of memory make this a great, value for money device suitable for any member of the family! Would recommend

The tablet runs perfectly on Android. I am not a natural with technology but even I found it very easy to set up. It has a clear screen and good sound quality. I would a prefer a longer battery life bit it is not a major fault.
I love the size, it is so slim. It slides in my handbag easily and weighs nothing at all. I would like a slim wallet type cover for it. I take it everywhere.
My favourite is the camera, as you will see from the attached pictures. They are so good.
A good value tablet.

A Smart 10.3" android lightweight tablet, fast and child-friendly further advanced far outweighs others on the market. Expandable memory up to 128gb. It’s very responsive from first touch and very fast. Atmos dolby speakers features quality clear, crisp sound and it also incorporates the google assistant. The tablet has dual sim card slots, great for access to internet on the go. Front and rear cameras take very clear pictures. From the start a useful wizard swift set up. I highly recommend.

This tablet is a high quality design that lightweight and easy to use. It can be operated using face recognition which is a great safety feature and helpful for multi use. 
The battery life surprised me as it’s very long. 
My toddler loves exploring the kids mode which is full of fun monster activities including stories, nursery rhymes and interactive learning games. The position alert is another great feature to stop neck and back strain. This tablet is everything you need and more.

The Lenovo M10 FHD Plus is a stunningly slim  tablet. The 10.3” display is very responsive to even the slightest touch and very durable when kids press on it heavily. When streaming there is little to no loading times and the HD IPS display makes your program more fun to watch as you can see even the minute details .Camera images are brought to life by the display.The powerful Octa Core Chip is the brains behind the tablet which allows the tablet to process so quickly and effortlessly.

This tablet is a good size (10.3") and light. Screen is HD sharp and sound/volume a good range even on live TV. 8mp rear, 5mp front camera takes photos well and videos are clear in picture and sound. Comes with fast charger and pin to open SD slot. A friend commented that my picture was clearer on Zoom with what I usually use. When initially switched on the instructions were easy to follow. Has facial recognition as well as password.
